thread.section_title: Compare Broadband Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Compare Broadband | comparebroadband.com.au
thread.title: Leonardo Alvares Da Costa
thread.title_full: Compare Broadband reviewed by Leonardo Alvares Da Costa

author: Leonardo Alvares Da Costa
title: Leonardo Alvares Da Costa
text: I'm from Brazil and I've just moved to Melbourne at an apartment on CDB. Using my mobile phone I searched at Google some options for home broadband and when the Compare Broadband appeared in the results, I clicked on it. It was very easy to use, just a simple form to fill with an excellent experience. After few minutes a technician called and guided me through into the best deal. I contracted the internet at the same time, with no problems. Thank you.
